  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:aspect:evizus_sl/10001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>aspect:evizus_sl/10001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Elektronska pošta</string>
            <string language="en">E-mail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">E-mail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">E-mail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E-mail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">E-mail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρονικό ταχυδρομείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">E-mail</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Uvod v e-pošto, razlaga protokolov (pop, imap, smpt), nastavitve za najpogostejše poštne odjemalce in nekaj o varnosti.</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction to e-mail service, explanation of used protocols (pop, imap, smpt), how to setup most common e-mail clients, something about security.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">evizus</string>
            <string language="en">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">e-pošta</string>
            <string language="en">e-mail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">protokol</string>
            <string language="en">protocol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">poštni odjemalec</string>
            <string language="en">e-mail client</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">varnost</string>
            <string language="en">security</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in einen E-mail Service, Erklärung 
der verwendeten Protokolle (Knall, imap, smpt), wie man die meisten 
gemeinen E-mail Klienten, etwas über Sicherheit installiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction au service de E-mail, explication 
des protocoles utilisés (bruit, IMAP, smpt), comment installer la 
plupart des clients communs de E-mail, quelque chose au sujet de la 
sécurité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução ao serviço do E-mail, explanação 
de protocolos usados (PNF, imap, smpt), como setup a maioria de 
clientes comuns do E-mail, algo sobre a segurança.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione a servizio di E-mail, spiegazione 
dei protocolli usati (schiocco, imap, smpt), come installare la 
maggior parte dei clienti comuni di E-mail, qualcosa circa sicurezza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στην υπηρεσία ηλεκτρονικού ταχυδρομείου, 
εξήγηση των χρησιμοποιημένων πρωτοκόλλων (σκάστε, imap, 
smpt), πώς στην οργάνωση οι περισσότεροι κοινοί χρήστες 
ηλεκτρονικού ταχυδρομείου, κάτι για την ασφάλεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción al servicio del E-mail, 
explicación de los protocolos usados (estallido, imap, smpt), cómo 
setup a la mayoría de clientes comunes del E-mail, algo sobre 
seguridad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">E-mail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Protokoll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">E-mail Klient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicherheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">E-mail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">protocole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">client de E-mail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sécurité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E-mail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">protocolo</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">cliente do E-mail</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">sicurezza</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">E-mail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">protocolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cliente del E-mail</string>
          </keyword>
